website_summaries.verdict: Axent Wear's speaker-equipped, LED-lit Cat Ear Headphones are fun for costumes, but they don't sound very good.
cons: Very bass-heavy sound with little high-end to balance it

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last a year! No more sound in the left ear at all! Very disappointed. Reading other reviews and sites reveals that this is a common issue due to poor internal wiring. Furthermore Brookstone won't acknowledge the problem or take responsibility for it. I contacted them, and all they said was that they were not legally obligated to help. Guess who isn't shopping at Brookstone for Christmas anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre quality, it seems. No longevity.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones themselves are great, but after a few days of usage, the sounds are starting to cut out with static. Update: It's now been exactly two months, and they are completely inoperable. No sound at all, one of the stems that hold the actual speaker in place is broken, and the lights are faded. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: AviKerensky

customer_reviews.title: Started off good, but hasn't lasted.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered these and she was really excited to receive them, initially they worked great. The sound quality was good, the ear speakers worked good, but after only about 3 uses things started not working. The detachable mic would randomly stop working and then the right side headphone stopped working. I have to say that I'm disappointed, these were not cheap headphones and for their price I would expect them to work and last longer than a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Goddess 13

customer_reviews.title: No!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Stopped working after only a month and a half of use. The right ear no longer has any sound absolutely irritating for such an expensive pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Isis

customer_reviews.title: They were good while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: They were good while they lasted. Less then a year and only 1 side works. So these headphones arnt solid. I'll change my review if I ever get sent replacement
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Fun looking, but arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Fun looking, but arrived broken. Sound only came out of one side and it was difficult to get the lights to come on. Overall a poor quality product and I was hesitant to buy in the first place since others noted issues with them not functioning properly, but my daughter really liked the design. Unless they fix the quality I do not recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for awhile
customer_reviews.text: This was my second pair of these headphones, the first pair lasted for a few years before needing replaced so I bought this second pair in July 2018, now in October 2018 part of the headphones have snapped. Very unhappy with the quality of these compared to my first ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn J

customer_reviews.title: Warning: High Failure Rate
customer_reviews.text: Product came in and right away had a minor issue, the catear speakers, used to "share music", did not work. I simply assumed I did not know how to use this feature at first until a few months later one of the two ears began to flicker. A month after that they were completely dead. Noticed all of the other low star reviews have similar stories, and hoped to save someone their money. Contacted seller, never got a response. Contacted Amazon, "Nothing we can do" Do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua K. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: (Update) They broke on me.... I actually loved these things and the pivoting part to where the headphone cuffs can move snapped... so now I can't wear them and the wire is exposed and most likely going to just break completely. $130 down the drain. ((((((((((old review)))))))))These are just ....Freaking amazing! I always get questions about these and I tell them you can buy them from Amazon! A little pricy however they are quite worth the price. Amazing sound quality from the inside and the speakers on the ears get really loud. Which is great! Also yes both speakers play. The inside ones and the ear speakers play when you them them on.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Weems

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are not only adorable but amazing! They work as expected just charge them up and they are good to go. But I had ordered my first set and it broke on me within the week, i put for a replacement and it still works today months later but the said thing is i tried to return the replacement twice. And the first time it was sent back due to a faulty label and the second time it was sent back for an unknown reason and I was charged again without permission. Hopefully the headphones can be fixed so this wasnt a flat out waste of money. I recommend the headphones but look for a different place to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought these long time ago and kept for display and charged frequently but then all of a sudden one of the lights stopped working and then it continued to flickers on other occasions. I was not at all happy with this and the noise spread too uneasy and a bit scratchy. Not to mention the headpiece, which had been the only good thing it came with, continues to make noise. Overall, this was great at first but it's now dead and I only got to use it twice over the 3 years I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Luxunny

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this Trash!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter not too long ago. and the lights on the left cat ear stopped working. and also... every time she wants to do something with them. she has to tilt her head to the right side for the right ear cup to work. Edit: 12/1/18: Headphones just stopped working completely. Very Disappointed Do no waste $80.00 on this. if you want something good for gaming. Get a Razer Headset instead, or Even steelseries
customer_reviews.author: Garreth Heidt

customer_reviews.title: I love it... But won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought it about two years ago. I loved it... Though it proved challenging to wear because I have thick poofy hair, but I was able to overall. The cord died on me a couple of months later, but that's okay, buying quick replacement isn't that difficult. The arms don't extend far, which causes a lot of stress on the headphones; but it can't be helped, like I said poofy hair. Thinking about getting a replacement set, but the reviews are starting to pull me away. Overall, with gentle use, it could last a pretty long time. I just wish they gave the headphones more extension for the ears in case if hair volume.
customer_reviews.author: Li

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights, good sound, variable battery life
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I LOVE the light, and I love them as an earphone set. The only warning my best friend gave me was that the battery life for the lights is pretty short. Which is technically true, depending on how much you intend to use them. If you want to look cool or something and take them out, then you'll be needing to charge them pretty often. And it does take a bit to charge them up. BUT, in my opinion, they'e awesome and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L

customer_reviews.title: they sound great with every kind of music I can find
customer_reviews.text: I adore these! Not too heavy, they sound great with every kind of music I can find. The only nitpick I have at the moment is that the little cable that came with them doesn't seem to play well with my phone jack. It's touchy and staticky, and it likes to randomly stop playing mid-song and/or jack the volume all the way up and won't let me turn it back down; even if I use the buttons on the line. I'm thinking it just needs to be replaced with another one, or perhaps my phone just doesn't like it. Either way, I'm still happy with this over all.
customer_reviews.author: Vastarien202

customer_reviews.title: Epic!♡♡♡♡♡
customer_reviews.text: Epic!!! i love this so much!! it suprised me and got to me 4 days eirly!! its fast charging and once u get the hang of the speker function its really cool. I am still getting the hang of it so i crank my ipod then figer out the spekers then turn the sound down on my ipod before i put it on my head >-_-< mew!! Loving them for more than ayear now they still work outhers should think about switching hedphones our every so oftan and make shure ur not using them duing rain and snow!! And make shure u use the travel case like the manual saya to!!!♡♡♡♡♡
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Low quality.
customer_reviews.text: Switching to speakers was finicky to begin with. Now 4 months later the battery won't charge and you can't even use the speakers/lights while plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Amie E. Winters

customer_reviews.title: Heavy; Unable to change volume
customer_reviews.text: This is very heavy on my head (so if you have neck problems, this probably isn't for you). It's a pretty neat gimmick (having the speakers in the ears) & great for cosplay. The light is OK & the sound quality for the external speakers is ok too. I've had issue with volume control on this headset though, I can't seem to get it to increase or decrease without messing with my computer's settings. It's kind of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I got it a day earlier than expected. The box was a little dirty on the inside but the product itself was perfect. The sound is great as well as the speakers and the lights are amazing. I've gotten so many compliments on them (and some uncomfortable stares). I haven't tested the mic yet, but if anything changes I'll update this. I really love them so far. I just hope that if they're going to malfunction, they do so before the 30 days are up, since I wasn't allowed to get warranty in Canada.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Oh. My. Gosh! I LOVE LOVE LOVE these with all my heart. The sound quality is great. The way they glow is perfect AND they seem to be pretty sturdy. Its a great combination of functionality and cuteness!! I would highly recommend these. I am a new twitch streamer and I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha F.

customer_reviews.title: A Lump of Half Glowing, Cheap Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a gift. Came broke out of the box. The overall quality of the plastic was very cheap, the kind dollar store toys are made of, about half of the LEDs were ether dead or dying, and the sound quality was about the same as gas station headphones. I thought I bought the cheap knock-off version. Needless to say the person who received the gift was very disappointed and I felt terrible for basically giving them a lump of half glowing, cheap plastic. Returned and will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty expensive for the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this at all. I saved up for a while to get these and after using it for about a month, the mic stopped working. So now they are just a pair of low quality headphones since no one can hear me through them anymore. I'm really disappointed. Other then that, really cute, comfortable and the light is nice and bright. Really wish they worked.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two months before lights failed
customer_reviews.text: These cat ear headphones look super cute, they stand out for sure and the sound quality is great but when your buying headphones you want them to last for a few years, mine have already developed an issue with the lights after just under 2 months of very light use. Currently, the wiring for the lights is failing, the lights will only turn on with the headphones in a certain position, once they are moved they will immediately turn off, also when external speakers are working and the light button is pressed, the external speakers will stop working. Having to go through warranty for replacement ~ was hoping to use them for a anime convention in a months time.
customer_reviews.author: Tsukasa Hiiragi

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but...
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute, my only issue is that the headset only works on one side. Idk if that's the product itself, or if mine is just a defect. I've had it for a while now, but that is how it was shipped. Not too big of an issue but it does bother me. The mic and everything works, but I'd like to hearing from both sides of the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: I love the headphones but I noticed it had issues with ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the headphones but I noticed it had issues with the cat ear speakers. They would sometimes work and other times not at all , which is very strange. I wanted these for so long which made me sad that they wouldn't work. I ended up talking to someone at the brookstone store who confirmed the wired headphones have issues, Ended up being refunded and I ordered the new Bluetooth cat ear headphones. I am happy :) These are great sound quality and work awesomely , It was just the speakers wouldn't work
customer_reviews.author: Dani Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought my headphones over 2 years ago, I love playing xbox with them, I think they're super Comfortable, I even use them when I'm talking on the phone, I have no issues or problems with my headphones I even bought another set for birthday present, And I like the fact they of come in a durable Box!!! I'll probably end up buying another pair just so I can have a different color, And I do honestly think these are well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jazy

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a geek with these headphones but I still absolutely ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel like a geek with these headphones but I still absolutely adore them. I've had them for a few months now and they still live up to my expectations. The volume that comes out of the speakers is pretty loud and the lights are bright. The only thing that sucks is the charging cord for the speakers/lights is pretty short. They are very comfortable to wear and cover my entire ears and the detachable mic is nice too for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra white

customer_reviews.title: Took a minute for me to figure these out. ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a minute for me to figure these out. At first the sound was cutting in and out, figured I had the volume too low. Turning the volume up helped, I've never had headphones that couldn't play at low volumes. It has decent sound quality though, and they're just so cute! I wish the aux cord was longer though. Not sure if I would buy again, but I'm not saying I definitely wouldnt. They'really just so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: External speakers didnt work.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and led lights are are all great, it even comes with a detachable microphone for gaming. The external speakers however dont work. I'd like to contact brookstone but I cant find out how. The manual does not address troubleshooting. I don't need the external but that was the only deciding factor of why I didnt get a cheaper pair.
customer_reviews.author: EchoFelicis25

customer_reviews.title: Makes weird noises with mic.
customer_reviews.text: So these headphones are super cute and they're pretty comfy. The sound quality is good and the mic is clear. The downside my friends say that randomly my mic makes a sound like those clapping hand toys make when you shake them back and forth and it really annoys them. I dont hear it but it's been multiple times by different friends that have complained about it as well as some saying theres and echo. Everything else about them is fine. But I'm just confused by this. My friend has the blue pair and hers dont make these sounds that mine does.
customer_reviews.author: emily jacob

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! I use them frequently as a competitive gamer. My teammates have noted that the microphone isn't the best quality, but they can still hear me clearly (gameplay isn't affected). Sometimes the mic cuts out if I hit the cord though. The headphone quality is solid! I hear everyone loud and clear, and enjoy listening to music with them as well. They are a bit heavy and will fall if I look down. It's worth it though because the sound is good and they look so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: The plastic housing is so weak. The within a couple of months and I eventually couldn't use it because the wires eventually bent too much today it stop producing sound. Then my idiot self decided to buy another pair. Same thing happened. Don't buy water of money compared what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Reyn

customer_reviews.title: The headphone sound quality was good. The cat factor was cute
customer_reviews.text: The headphone sound quality was good. The cat factor was cute, and the teenager who utilized them was very excited. The build quality however left a little to be desired. After having the headphones one month the audio cable broke, we went to pull it out of the phone it was plugged in to and the headphone jack part came off its casing and stuck in the phone. We opted to get another audio cable, but 2 months after that the headphone on the right hand side quit working. They seem well built, but are not that sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Jeeplover1

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️ Neko Headphones ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Durable, Light Weight, Can hear music alone or in groups with these, Super Cute Light Up Color Feature, Cord can detach from the Headphones if you want to take pictures with them on. Cons: I don't see this as bad... However, some might find these a bit bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I had heard that these had a lot of trouble with the wiring not working right so I was iffy on buying them.. but took the chance anyway. Immediately after I got them in the mail I tested everything and it worked perfectly. The only thing thats seems off is that when the outward speakers are on the headphone speakers have a moderately loud static sound. That personally doesn't bother me since I don't plan on using them both at the same time anyway. They are a bit on the heavy side but the padding is enough to make it comfortable. (I did not test the microphone though. I personally don't use microphones)
customer_reviews.author: James I

customer_reviews.title: Cat ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: Despite the mixed ratings my daughter still decided to buy it. Unfortunately, the ear phones broke within a few weeks. She was so disappointed since this was her birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: J.F.

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews first
customer_reviews.text: So I always try to read the reviews on products before buying them but I didn’t get the chance to read the reviews for this product. I really do like the look of this headphones and love how cute they look on me but the light on the headphone already stopped working after one use. The same thing happened to my speaker mood I used it once and then after that stopped working. Everything else seems to be working fine just wish certain things wouldn’t break down so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gaming and listening to music
customer_reviews.text: So i have started gaming and have been searching for a great headset which was also cute. I first saw these at the brookstome store out shopping and thought I NEED THESE! And i searched for them on here and they are cheaper on here. $15-30 less depending on the color. I love that you can do so much w/ this headset, listen to music and have the music come out of the cat ears lol change the volume using the headset or cord and they sound really good too. Very clear. I want to get another color now just to have all of em lmao
customer_reviews.author: Bubbz

customer_reviews.title: Good for a little while
customer_reviews.text: My son has bought two of these, and they seem to only last for a few months. (He actually takes care of his stuff, so it's not like he's just tossing it around. He even had me put a hook on his wall to hang them up.) This second sets earbuds stopped working recently. Won't be buying a third.
customer_reviews.author: M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: It worked well untill...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these as if they were going out of style for about 2 months, though as I sit in class about to listen to music. I find that they broke on the right side where it's the in between the speaker and the main part of the headphone. It may be fixable if I add some strong glue such as E3000, I should not need to do that after only 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: cute, but defective
customer_reviews.text: The headphones started to be defective with normal use after not even 3 months. The wires are starting to short so that the right ear does not always get audio. Otherwise they are really nice, if a bit heavy after wearing for a while. They are cute, decent audio quality for a non-audiophile, and work great for conference calls, gaming, and listening to music. I'm just disappointed they broke so soon.
customer_reviews.author: tyrsia

customer_reviews.title: I love this headset
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset. It’s a cute change (visually) from my usual high quality gaming headsets, but honestly they sound really great in comparison. There’s an obvious difference, but for the price it’s amazing. However, within the first week I noticed the sound jumping between ears as I moved and eventually just went to one ear for a while. It somehow fixed itself though. The cat ear speakers are intense in the best way and the lifts are very cute. Make sure to purchase a male and female cord. It came with a very high quality carrying case as well!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great, but heavy. Not for kids, maybe older teens.
customer_reviews.text: I love them, but they are VERY heavy, so not great for a long gaming session. End up with headaches and neck pain. But again, I love them. They come in a lovely holder, with the wire and a mic, they light up, the sound from the front speakers is good. You can use both the headphone and the speakers at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Rowanmother

customer_reviews.title: Right earphone broken, don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, feels great, but the RIGHT EARPHONE STILL DOESN'T WORK. I bought a pair of the purple Cat Ear Headphones first, then returned them because the right earphone didn't work. Bought the blue pair about a month later, and AGAIN the right earphone isn't working. From what I've read, this seems to be a regular defect across this model. Save your money and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kijiri

customer_reviews.title: Battery powered, but amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I've wanted them since the Kickstarter and finally splurged on them! The sound quality is great and they're comfortable, but the fact that I have to charge them even to use them as headphones and their weight leaves a little to be desired. I haven't had any problems with them falling off my head, I'm just a little awkward with them on my head! But, a great buy! Definitely recommend. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Emilee

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy as heck
customer_reviews.text: The connection point to the ear cups is <1mm thick plastic that will snap under minimal usage. Broke within six months of use. The microphone is an afterthought and terrible quality, and the "speaker" function will work for all of about 5 minutes on battery. If you leave it plugged in to the USB for power, expect excessive buzzing from electrical interference.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 of 5
customer_reviews.text: These are completely perfect except for 2 details. 1. I'm a gamer that constantly socializes with my friends. They would always tell me to not use the microphone because it is difficult to hear although it is clear. Just the volume coming through there end was always low even when cutting my mic up. 2. I'm not sure what happened, but they snapped like a twig within a month. One of the ears pieces came completely off. They still work though!
customer_reviews.author: Coral

customer_reviews.title: Fragile!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable headphones! The light up gimmick is cute and the cat ears will make any cat lover swoon! But wait, don’t pick these up so fast! My pair broke within the first month of use!!! So what happened? I decided to ignore some of these negative reviews and bought them. Then the swivel mechanism in them broke, just like that. Now the headphones don’t fit my head and noise leaks out. Tried calling wanting to get them repaired and got nowhere. So I just tossed them in the trash. Honestly, I’m really disappointed in these. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Quality. Beautifully Designed.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are A-W-E-S-O-M-E!!!!!! They look beautiful (better than the picture) and sound crystal clear. They can also be used as speakers! Unfortunately, I was sent the wrong color and had to immediately initiate a return. But, I reordered the correct color and looking forward to them arriving in a few days. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Donnice

customer_reviews.title: These are SUPER well built
customer_reviews.text: I just realized these were from Brookstone. I am said they are going through bankruptcy. These are SUPER well built. The feel really sturdy and the sound is great. I don't know why they were priced so well. I wish I could change the colors of the LED lights but you can't. Other than that I am very happy with this purchase. The case was a nice touch also.
customer_reviews.author: Learn From Zero (G. Trombley)

customer_reviews.title: Not all hair type's can be used by them!
customer_reviews.text: I love them, these are the best headphones I have ever seen but the reason why I didn't put 5stars? is because my hair gets stuck in between the sides so I put tape on the sides where my hair gets stuck but I still end up with pieces of my hair getting stuck in the headphone's, even when I brush my hair I get pieces of my hair falling out... Another thing is the lights on the headphone's, kinda stopped working on some parts so I literally have to slap the living heck out of them to work. These are not bad headphones I just wish that you could make it so all people's can be used by them...
customer_reviews.author: Spoon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good for gaming, and cool!!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these since the kickstarter several years ago. I love it so much, it lights up and the ears are speakers that actually sound good!! Not super noise canceling, but great for gaming or even just listening to music, as the mic is removable. Love that they came with a carrying case!! I bought this on sale but it's worth every penny full price too.
customer_reviews.author: Sanna Dale

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: These run a little expensive for my tastes, but they are perfect. The cat ears are a fun addition to the headphones, which have great sound quality. I loved every minute of having these.
customer_reviews.author: melancholy101

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever for little girls!
customer_reviews.text: We got these for my 7 year old daughter for 2016 Christmas! She loved them so much. The external speaker quality is pretty decent for such tiny speakers and the headphones themselves have great sound quality as well. She wears them everywhere and people are always complimenting her on her awesome kitty ears! Everyone always marvels at how cute they are when they have them all lit up. And the question they always ask me is "Are those headphones?" and "Where did I get those"? Best gift of the season!
customer_reviews.author: Riccilynne

customer_reviews.title: LED light on one side stopped working a week after Christmas but my daughter does love this
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it only problem is a week after Christmas one side of the LED lights on the ear piece stopped lighting up so I'm in the process of seeing what can be done to fix that. I hate having to return anything I'm hoping there is an easy fix that I can do myself
customer_reviews.author: babs

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: I thought, for some reason, these were wireless. Definitely not. The cable is pretty short, too. Anyway, the sound is good and they're surprisingly not that heavy. I never use the mic or the lights, and rarely use the speakers (which are not super quality) so the charge lasts forever. I maybe charge these things once a month, and I am CONSTANTLY on my computer. Very impressed with the battery.
customer_reviews.author: J. Huls

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound (not perfect but decent), cute design, good material quality, bright led lights, loud speakers, long lasting battery, fast charging. It's hard to wear them in summer as they're really hot, perfect for late summer/autumn to keep your ears warm and collect bunches of compliments from strangers.
customer_reviews.author: Mariia

customer_reviews.title: Great but,
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable. The mic is not very rigid so keeping it in position is difficult. The usb is only for charging the lights it doesn’t connect for sound. If you want USB headphones, you’ll have to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: delstar79

customer_reviews.title: Charming and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Charming aesthetic and very good sound quality. Though, of course these head phones require more maintenance than regular head phones (i.e. always put it back in it's case when not in use, wipe it down occasionally). So just be careful to treat it with care. And the microphone attachment doesn't provide the best recordings but it is decent enough for gaming. The ear phones come with instructions that show you how to use each function such as the stereo earphones and how to charge the earphones, it's pretty user friendly. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of MONEY
customer_reviews.text: They worked for maybe three months and now have no sound. Very disappointed The warranty is almost impossible to utilize I am assuming to keep people from taking advantage of it but cheap made product to have stopped working so fast
customer_reviews.author: Karen D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: It is super bad
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing was that the headphones lit up, nothing else. The speakers don't work, the audio is super muffled, I couldn't change the volume using the buttons, and the mic was non-existence. Any noise above whispering would get cut off, so I couldn't talk normally. The mic detects background noises more than my voice and the static is super loud. Overall, it is really bad for something that costs almost $100.
customer_reviews.author: thang

customer_reviews.title: Looking Cool
customer_reviews.text: For the design and comfort, that's a plus point. Sound wise is not too bad. The detachable microphone has lots of noise though. My box came without the 3.5mm headphone cable, luckily I still had my old headphone cable with me. The carrying case is huge but well protected. Pretty glad that I chose the wired version ib the end. But to buy this after the stock went low was a regret, it costed lots more but at least better than a new headphone with broken microphone from my local store.
customer_reviews.author: Crestryn

customer_reviews.title: Cats in the cradle...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after a cheaper pair cracked after a week. Really cute and heavy duty. They come with a nice carry case. Audio cord is removable, which means it can be replaced, which is a nice feature for when the cord inevitably gets messed up. Switching from in ear mode to cat ear mode can be a little tricky, but it is nice feature to be able to share music.
customer_reviews.author: MKeel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones!
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing more adorable then me in cat ear headphones! =b Also they have amazing sound. It doesn't have a specific noise canceling feature, but they are decent at it anyways. I use these headphones for online gaming and the mic works marvelously. Additionally they are very comfortable. I would note however that if you plan on using the mic, some computers require an extra piece (a microphone seperator) that you'll need to buy seperate, but other then that these are awesome headphones. They make great presents!!
customer_reviews.author: jenn roark

customer_reviews.title: Slightly squeaky and creaky
customer_reviews.text: The sound and quality is great aside from the joints of the left side. They are constantly squeaking and creaking with the slightest movement. The headphones are heavy enough that they tend to sit still on your head but sometimes while walking or wearing them around my neck the squeaks drive me crazy. The right side is perfectly silent so maybe my pair is just slightly defective. Battery life is also great and for how much I use them I need to charge it every few days.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: The best things in life are worth taking care of
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product but delicate. The cord is the weak link. They increased the price alot since i baught one. If it goes back down I'd give it one more shot because I had ALOT of fun with mine but the fun didnt last long after the aux port started malfunctioning. Hoping to get it fixxed either way. Like seroiusly partying with this is heavenly.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph s.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but the fit is wrong
customer_reviews.text: My head is large which is typical of Aspergers Syndrome, but this even slips off my massive cranium. I don’t have a head as big as Megamind. He might like the fit better. I love the cushions and the purple color and the cat ear speakers are adorable. I very much appreciated the detachable mic as someone who has played co op on mmorpgs and had mic issues.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonSuperShopper

customer_reviews.title: Absolute love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! They are adorable and I love to share what I am listening to with my friends. They are comfortable and sound great! I am a bit of an earphone snob so I wasn't expecting much but I was pleasantly surprised. They come in a nice case and have detachable cord and mic. I always get compliments and smiles when wearing these!
customer_reviews.author: Baby

customer_reviews.title: 11 Year Old Daughter LOVES Them!!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are absolutely awesome! They work perfectly and every function and/or button works as stated. Was worried they were going to be too big just because my little girl is on the smaller size but they adjust nicely and are lightweight. Very good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: PinkLace

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy they did not come with a splinter for the mic Evan thou its supost to they are far to heavy for your head I could barley keep them on my head for the price so not worth it your more or less paying the money for the holder then the headset
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I JUST got them today and have only used them for about an hour on my PS4, and I noticed the light on the left side is out. When I first turned them on I noticed it flickering but stopped so I didn’t thought it was fine. Also, when I’m talking to people online, they say it sounds like I keep muting and unmuting my mic, which I wasn’t. I love these so I really hope I can get these exchanged for a pair that work. Also bought the warranty for it, but the warranty doesn’t cover items that are delivered broken.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Winter

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came with the new iPhone connection and not just the standard head phone jack
customer_reviews.author: Dani Pasquini

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable
customer_reviews.text: I've been through a lot of headsets that didn't work out for me. I can hardly wear anything over or in my ears because of sensitivity issues but these are very comfortable. I'm very glad they don't hurt my ears when wearing them because they're adorable. They also come in a really really nice case. Sound quality is really great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rinn

customer_reviews.title: Meoooow
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this headset. My first pair arrived with a short in it and unfortunately I had to exchange it but the second pair I've received I have not had any issues with. I've been using it for several months with much success and amusement.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Mewsagi

customer_reviews.title: Adorbs!
customer_reviews.text: Well, these are the cutest things! My daughter just loves them .... and has even decided to dress up as a cat at Halloween and play cat-themed songs from the ear speakers! LOL! These are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Angelia

customer_reviews.title: Christmas 2016
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful item thus far, my 12 year old loved it. She was surprised for Christmas. I thought I ordered the one with Bluetooth compatibility, so that was very disappointing. Love the storage box it comes in, compartments for storing cords. Speaker quality from external ears could've been better, but internal speakers are nice quality. So far great product..
customer_reviews.author: Nika C

customer_reviews.title: Okay headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute. Came in great shape. Reason for three stars is that it only came with one working side to hear out of. Should have done my research because apparently this happens a lot. They light up perfectly though. I bought them for streaming online with my PS4 and they are kinda hard to figure out how to switch back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbe Clark

customer_reviews.title: I am giving them 4 stars for the amount of coolness they provide and the super case that they came in
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our daughter for her birthday after she asked for them for months. I have not listened to the sound quality. I am giving them 4 stars for the amount of coolness they provide and the super case that they came in. The lights are super!! The speakers to make them shareable is great! Daughter is 10. She certainly has the coolest headphones around, according to her.
customer_reviews.author: KJM

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how nice these headphones were, I got them on sale for $30. The color on them is great, the battery has lasted longer than any amount of time I've tried to use them. The sound quality is the most surprising, very clear sound, good bass, tight seal around the ears. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Kitty cat likes music
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 16 yr old niece, she loves them. I tried them on and the sound is fantastic and even with music off these headphones have great noise reduction. Being able to allow others to listen to what your listening to without taking the headset off it a nice added feature. Great carrying case to store headset. Cute cat ears and added purple color lighting and these were a great purchse.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Burnside

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted these for a really long time I'm happy with them. They are really cute the sound quality could be better. The speaker suprised me and my sister who wants her own pair now. They are super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Krystina

customer_reviews.title: Faulty LEDs out of the box...
customer_reviews.text: Mine just arrived - after reading other reviews, I noticed that the box I received was not sealed, so I plugged in the charger to check the headphones... Sure enough, one of the top speaker LEDs is not working. I'll be contacting customer service ASAP to get a replacement and really hope the next pair is brand new and working, as the aesthetic of the working LEDs is very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Tarz

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, comfort and fit, but LEDs died within a month.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, the headphones can be adjusted quite a bit so it fit nice and snugg. The speakers work great as well, if a little quiet. That said within a month the LED on the right ear suddenly died, and this seems to be a pretty common problem along with the audio eventually dying too. Buyer beware, whether these things last or not seems to be a roll of the dice. Headset just broke, they lasted roughly a year before a thinner piece of plastic on the ear snapped.
customer_reviews.author: College Student

customer_reviews.title: Cute but HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on sale and at first I was ecstatic. Fast forward a couple of months, I HATE them. Sound/mic quality is fine, the actual functionality of the sound is great. The headset is sturdy BUT it's so HEAVY. I cannot stand to wear these for more than a few minutes. My head and neck start to hurt because this headset is just so bulky and heavy. So my low rating is for comfort and not about functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Garner

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: At first only one side of the speakers worked. I wasn't sure if they just needed to be broken in or what. And I could get the speakers on top to work for a while. (The part so everyone can hear) But after reading instructions and messing with them for an hour, it started working. They aren't as bad as some other people rate them.
customer_reviews.author: C.Gard

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months of use!
customer_reviews.text: This product was great. Then it stopped working out of nowhere after two months of light use! This is not ok! Considering this, I highly discourage people to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: R.P.

customer_reviews.title: I Love these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I Absolutely love these neko headphones! I love the design, the sound emitted when listening to songs with a hard bass, the light up LEDS, the comfortability of the headphones, and the stereo implanted in the headphones! I actually cannot find anything wrong with these headphones and hope to never find any errors. Great buy and I HIGHLY suggest purchasing this!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Was GREAT, at FIRST...
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was super pleased with this purchase but after a week the mic was getting “static” as I was told, and it progressively got worse until yesterday I was told that it didn’t work at all as I was talking in mic chat and it quit working. I don’t even have the box anymore and don’t even know how to begin sending this back, I hope that this issue gets fixed promptly as I loved these headphones at first and hope I just got a faulty pair.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming on console
customer_reviews.text: Love them, I use them for gaming and the sound it’s perfect, I can hear every little sound in the game from footsteps to birds in the distance. The sound for music is great as well and the speakers on the cat ears aren’t bad, anyway if you’re looking for gaming headset or just good quality music headphones this are the pair to get plus they light up! And cat ears duh!
customer_reviews.author: Bossanova

customer_reviews.title: Super. Freaking. Cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I saw these, I had to have them! They are super cute and stylish! The audio quality is amazing and I love the additional LED lights and the option to share your music with friends with just a press of a button. The only drawback, and its a small one, is that you have to charge the headphones for 3 hours. They are so awesome and make music listening fun!
customer_reviews.author: fayth

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good headphones, but doesn't replace a wireless speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for several months. Headphones are really quite decent. External speakers need to be cranked up really loud to be heard, which means you can't be wearing them at the same time, and even then the sound quality isn't great. More of a novelty than anything. Mine broke after several months with sound only coming out if one earpiece. Contacted Brookstone and they replaced it for me. Very good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Necrotari

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 months, and now the return window is closed, my money wasted! So frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: MelCandyLizzy

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed. But it’s a little heavy other then that is good just for fashion. The sound quality it great and the speakers are amazing, I still have and Use mine to this day. I do recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Arismel

customer_reviews.title: Completely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these headphones for around 4 months and they work great! The sound quality is way better than my old cheap ones, the noise reduction is a lifesaver, and I love the cute cat ears on it. I don't use the extra features all that much, but even if you just need a pair of nice headphones, I'd recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for a year
customer_reviews.text: I love the headphones, but they only worked well for a year. I have to get a new aux cord for the headphones. I had a shorter aux cord and tested it out. The headphones worked fine, but the aux cord that came with it was going out.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these on June 15th and they have already broken. The headphone jack stayed in the headphone port on my computer when disconnecting the headset. RX Discount is a third party seller and does not have a contract with Brookstone so Brookstone will not honor the manufacturer warranty. I loved this headset during it's short lifespan, but breaking within 3 months... I do love these enough to repurchase, but be warned product durability is not great. Hopefully the new set will last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Rose Garden Bridal sells garbage
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that the headphones were garbage, obviously defective. And the seller rose garden bridal has crappy ratings and I can see why, they sell poor quality merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Kmack75

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting these headphones for a long time now. A friend of mine has a pair that has so far lasted a year and still work. These headphones are very well made. I absolutely love them. Heavy, yes but I don't mind that. It just means they were made well. I will buy another pair when the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is sub pare at best. I wouldn't use these for gaming even though it comes with a mic. I bought them because they were cute and I wanted some quality headphones for home use. I also liked the speakers in the cat ears very nice feature! However the head phones are falling apart. The plastic head band is bent and breaking. This is not a case of "user error" as I take care of my things and didn't wear them often anyway. Very disappointed on how cheaply these where made especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cayenne

customer_reviews.title: Bad USB! :(
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend absolutely loves these headphones but the downside was they came with a rusted micro usb which was really troublesome. Luckily I have other micro usb's in the house and this didn't completely ruin one of her birthday gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Ndiesel1

product_meta.title: Brookstone Wired Cat Ear Headphones
product_meta.description: Color:BlueWired Cat ear headphones. You saw them on Indiegogo and fell in love at first sight. Now you can get your own pair right here! Enjoy your music privately-orr turn on the cat ear speakers to share with friends LED accent lights on cat ear speakers and earcups make a statement anywhere speakers and lights are controlled independently over-the-ear cushioning for noise reduction and a secure fit USB rechargeable-upp to 5 hours of playing time per charge Detachable gaming boom mic inline volume control plus forward & back buttons listen privately or Share your music with your friends. Slip the cushioned ear cups over your ears and they conform the unique shape of your head, blocking out background noise and letting you enjoy all the rich, vibrant sound you expect from premium headphones. But that's just the beginning. With the Flip of a switch, your headphones go from private sound studio to a party-rocking sound system everyone around you can enjoy as your music pumps through the external Cat ear speakers. These headphones look as great as they sound. The headphones you wear make a fashion statement, and these cat ear headphones make one of the coolest there is. Their distinct shape and prominent Cat ears are accented by bright LED lights that can be controlled independently from the speakers. Light 'EM up to suit you mood, your wardrobe, or just because you can. Gamers, meet your new favorite headset. When it's time to make the switch from music to gaming, Cat ear headphones have you covered. Simply plug in the detachable boom mic and you've got the coolest looking headset around. Game on! Headphone audio 20Hz-20KHz frequency response 32 Ohm impedance 40mm drivers Cat ear speaker Audio 200hz-18khz frequency response 4 Ohm impedance 32mm drivers what's in the box Cat ear headphones detachable gaming mic 4' Detachable headphone cable (3.5mm) USB recharging cable protective carry case Get your paws on the Indiegogo sensation.
feature_bullets: Enjoy your music privately—or turn on the cat ear speakers to share with friends
Over-the-ear cushioning for noise reduction and a secure fit
Usb rechargeable to 5 hours of playing time per charge
Inline volume control plus forward & back buttons
Speakers and lights are controlled independently

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars1,492 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
